template_info.name: Fighting-Type Dojo
template_info.description: A physical powerhouse team of fighting types with massive attack stats and diverse coverage
template_info.usage_notes: Fighting types excel at physical attacks and breaking through defensive Pokemon. Use bulk up and focus energy to set up devastating sweeps.
learning_objectives: Mastering setup sweeping with stat boosts
Dealing with psychic and flying weaknesses

pokemon.name: machamp
pokemon.strategy: Massive attack with confusion-inducing Dynamic Punch
pokemon.tips: Dynamic Punch has 100% confusion rate - very disruptive

pokemon.name: hitmonlee
pokemon.strategy: High-speed physical attacker with powerful STAB
pokemon.tips: High Jump Kick is extremely powerful but has recoil risk

pokemon.name: hitmonchan
pokemon.strategy: Elemental punch specialist with perfect coverage
pokemon.tips: Elemental punches give coverage against typical fighting counters

pokemon.name: poliwrath
pokemon.tips: Water typing eliminates fire weakness common to fighting types

pokemon.name: primeape
pokemon.tips: Higher speed than most fighting types - good for revenge kills

pokemon.name: machoke
pokemon.tips: Rest + Sleep Talk combo allows continuous attacking while healing
